The '''Zombie Chest''' is a possible reward for exchanging [[Ichor]] at the [[Scientist]] during the [[Monster Hunt 2018]] event. 

=Possible loot=

* :Coupon: [[Gift Coupon: Horse]]
* :Coupon: [[Gift Coupon: Pig]]
* :Coupon: [[Gift Coupon: Mouse]]
* :Coupon: [[Gift Coupon: Owl]]
* :Coupon: [[Gift Coupon: Gopher]]
* :Bookgreen: [[Rare Scroll of Peace (Green)]]
* :Bookgreen: [[Rare Scroll of Rage (Green)]]
* :Bookblue: [[Rare Scroll of Peace (Blue)]]
* :Bookblue: [[Rare Scroll of Rage (Blue)]]
